title: Joining RoT - General Chat - Reign of Terror
text: Jarjar inks Report post Posted November 19, 2023 I am coming back to runescape after leaving for a few years. In the past I have pked with smaller teams (10-20 man). Iâ€™m looking for guidance on how to join rot and to get back into multi pking.
